title: Bug 116786Library include should store relative path.
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer is not generating or saving the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library from a different location using a relative path (e.g., $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary).
